content: Homepage | Hamdi DIBEKLIOGLU Quick links: content, navigation, search. Navigation Home About Me Teaching Research Publications Projects Contact Welcome to my website I am an Assistant Professor in the Computer Engineering Department of Bilkent University. I was previously a Postdoctoral Researher at Delft University of Technology, a Visiting Researcher at Carnegie Mellon University, University of Pittsburgh, and Massachusetts Institute of Technology, and a Research Assistant at the University of Amsterdam. My research interests include Affective Computing, Intelligent Human-Computer Interaction, Pattern Recognition, and Computer Vision.
